name: Sling Car Drifting
description:
Get ready to drift around an endless race track.This is probably the most addictive racing game!
Using your finger to control - one tap and hold can help your car sling drift.
You can improve your drifting skills over time.

Features:
◉ Fun running sling drift car sport
◉ Easy control and easy play
◉ Great visuals
◉ Many cars to choose
